template.name: Clientes OLT
template.description: ## Overview olt\_zte ======== scripts para busca do sinal do cliente de onu zte modelo f601 e envio para zabbix ### COMO UTILIZAR * crie uma estrutura de Pastas: + mkdir PON\_{1..N} #N = numero de portas da olt [![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8582515/47580860-60c04c80-d926-11e8-92a9-ebaaad328f6c.png)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8582515/47580860-60c04c80-d926-11e8-92a9-ebaaad328f6c.png) ### <a id="user-content-tenha-o-zabbix\_agent-instalado" class="anchor" style="box-sizing: border-box; background-color: initial; color: #0366d6; float: left; padding-right: 4px; margin-left: -20px; line-height: 1;" href="https://github.com/anderson-raber/ol ## Author Anderson Raber
